subject: feat: clarify Discover metric labels for non-technical users
body:
Replace developer jargon with plain language across all 20 Discover tab
metrics. Labels like "Avg Commit Size", "Deletion Ratio", "Refactor Work"
become "Avg Change Size", "Code Removed", "Code Cleanup". All sub-text
"commits" replaced with "changes".

https://claude.ai/code/session_01JiBipRsvhKuoDSEpUdTucf
title: clarify Discover metric labels for non-technical users
